H0.text: where does summer of the monkeys take place. Oklahoma

H1.text: where does summer of the monkeys take place. Arkansas

H2.text: where does summer of the monkeys take place. Texas

H3.text: where does summer of the monkeys take place. Missouri

A4.text: In the summer of 1910, a group of circus chimpanzees named Henri, Jacques, Antoinette and Dominique escape from a French circus due to a train wreck and end up in the Oklahoma river bottoms, where the main character, Jay Berry Lee lives with his family.
